author: Simon Difford
description: Rum-laced sweet and sourness with maraschino liqueur brilliantly balancing grapefruit juice.
name: Bridgetown Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
